org.purl.sword.client

Class ServiceDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.purl.sword.client.ServiceDialog

  • public class ServiceDialog
extends Object
    Dialog that prompts the user to enter the details for a service document location.
    Author:
    Neil Taylor
